attributes.action: Reduce fuel duty on petrol and diesel
attributes.additional_details:
The government needs to reduce the cost of fuel duty on petrol and diesel, the average cost of petrol is £1.52 a litre and the average cost of diesel is £1.56 a litre, people are struggling to make ends meets, with the cost of household bills.
The government has control of the fuel duty so can implement the reduction immediately,
attributes.background: I want to government to reduce the cost of fuel duty.

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petitions open which you might like to sign:

Reduce fuel duty and VAT by 40% for a period of 2 years
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089

Temporarily suspend all taxes on all fuels and energy bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610585
